# UIBlurEffect.Style.prominent

**Case**

A blur style for making content more prominent that adapts to the user interface style.

## Declaration

```swift
case prominent
```

## Additional styles

- **UIBlurEffect.Style.extraLight**: The area of the view is lighter than the underlying view.
- **UIBlurEffect.Style.light**: The area of the view is the same approximate lightness of the underlying view.
- **UIBlurEffect.Style.dark**: The area of the view is darker than the underlying view.
- **UIBlurEffect.Style.extraDark**: The area of the view is even more dark than the underlying view.
- **UIBlurEffect.Style.regular**: A regular blur style that adapts to the user interface style.
